h2_title: Best Spirits to Use in Black Myth: Wukong
content: This is another Spirit you can collect from Chapter 1, and with it, you can use the Veiled Vipers special attack. When you perform this, four snakes will appear to help you out, dealing poison damage to enemies.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Best_Spirits_to_Use.md', within the main section titled 'Best Spirits to Use', specifically from the subsection 'Best Spirits to Use in Black Myth: Wukong' and the sub-subsection 'Guangmou'.
The content is as follows:
This is another Spirit you can collect from Chapter 1, and with it, you can use the Veiled Vipers special attack. When you perform this, four snakes will appear to help you out, dealing poison damage to enemies.
